department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: Bowl, overglaze painted ware; mounted ladies beside pool; polychrome overglaze.
medium: Stone paste (fritware) with overglaze painted decoration
text: The theme of two horsemen on either side of a tree frequently appears on mina'i ware. It might have alluded to a hunt scene, a luxury enjoyed by the princely classes.
title: Mina'i ware Bowl
